summary: A Polish-Jewish family comes to the U.S. at the beginning of the twentieth century. There, the family and their children try to make themselves a better future in the so-called promised land.
cast: Leo Fuchs|Eve Gordon|Lou Jacobi|Armin Mueller-Stahl|Elizabeth Perkins|Joan Plowright|Kevin Pollak|Aidan Quinn|Israel Rubinek|Elijah Wood|Grant Gelt|Mindy Loren Isenstein|Shifra Lerer|Mina Bern|Frania Rubinek|Neil Kirk|Ronald Guttman|Rachel Aviva|Sylvia Weinberg|Ralph Tabakin|Steve Aronson|Miles A. title: Avalon
